p: 3. We note that your article has been submitted as a "Collection Review" article type, but is a research article submitted to the Project SOAR Collection. When resubmitting your manuscript, we ask that you update your article type to "Research Article" in the online submission form. Please note that some fields in the submission form, particularly in the "Additional Information" field, will have been reset with this change, so please go through your submission in full to ensure that all information is accurate and complete when resubmitting your manuscript.
